sentences.en: audio and/or video components.
sentences.cn: 音频与（或）视频成分。

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentences.cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

sentences.en: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
sentences.cn: 他弹吉他唱民歌。

sentences.en: He was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.cn: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentences.cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentences.en: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
sentences.cn: 他去买炸鱼薯条了。

sentences.en: I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
sentences.cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

sentences.en: I missed supper and I’m starving!
sentences.cn: 我没吃晚饭，现在饿极了！

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentences.cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentences.en: She didn’t speak to anyone and nobody spoke to her.
sentences.cn: 她不跟别人说话，也没人跟她说话。

sentences.en: She went directly to Simon's apartment and knocked on the door.
sentences.cn: 她直奔西蒙的房间，敲了敲门。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.cn: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentences.cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentences.en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentences.cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentences.en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
sentences.cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。

sentences.en: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.cn: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.en: What will be the effect of the alliance between IBM and Apple?
sentences.cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联手将会有什么效果呢？

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

phrases.tran_cn: 等等；的确；此外；连…一齐都
[美国英语](工资以外)供给膳宿[亦作 all found]
还有别的；还不止这些；比这个还要多
反之亦然；反过来也一样
[口语]等等[见 what 中的 what have you ]
诸如此类（等于and 等等（等于what have you）；what have you或what not）

trans.tran_cn: 和，又，加，然后，那么，结果是，愈来愈
trans.tran_en: used to join two words, phrases etc referring to things that are related in some way
used before saying the part of a large number which is less than 100
used to join two words, phrases etc referring to things that are related in some way
